Attribute Notes: Strong: +1 Strength step
Skills (12 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d4 Notice: (sma) d6 Stealth: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d6 Performance: (spi) d6 Thievery: (agi) d4
Fighting: (agi) d8 Persuasion: (spi) d6
Intimidation: (spi) d4 Science: (sma) d4
Skill Notes:
Intimidating: +1 Intimidation step
Can't Swim: -2 Athletics (swimming)
Darkvision: No illumination penalties up to 10"
Fame: +1 Persuasion (influence friendly individuals)
Outsider: -2 Persuasion (other races)
Size: 0
Advances: 0 Improvement Points: 4 Improvement Points Allocation: Edge: 4
Features
Edges (2 points): Fame; Fighter Hindrances: Can't Swim; Cautious; Suspicious+ Half-Orc Features: Darkvision; Intimidating; Orc Ferocity; Outsider; Strong
Feature Notes:
Fighter: Has Martial Flexibility feature
Cautious: Requires detailed plan before acting
Fame: 2x fee from performing
Suspicious+: Allies -2 on Support rolls
Combat
Parry: 7 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 9 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Leather Jacket Shield: Light Weapons: Dagger (d8+d4 R3"); Light Repeating Crossbow (2d6 R10"); Short Sword (d8+d6); Unarmed (d8+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +4 Parry
Orc Ferocity: +1 Toughness
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
